measures.expression: SUM('CHECK DETAIL TABLE'[EXTENDED PRICE])

measures.name: Revenue - Same Period - Last Year - Difference - CC
measures.expression:
IF (
    OR(
    ISBLANK ( [Revenue - Same Period - Last Year - CC] ),
    ISBLANK([Revenue])
    ),
    BLANK (),
    [Revenue] - [Revenue - Same Period - Last Year - CC]
)

measures.name: Revenue - YoY % Change - Same Period - Last Year - CC
measures.expression:
IF (
    ISBLANK ( [Revenue] ),
    BLANK (),
    DIVIDE (
        ( [Revenue] - [Revenue - Same Period - Last Year - CC]),
        [Revenue - Same Period - Last Year - CC]
    ))

measures.name: Revenue - Same Period - Last Year - CC
measures.expression:
IF(

				ISFILTERED('CALENDAR'[DATE]),
				
						CALCULATE(
								[Revenue],
								FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
								'CALENDAR'[YEAR - CUSTOM]=(MAX('CALENDAR'[YEAR - CUSTOM])-1) &&
								'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]>=MIN('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]) &&
								'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]<=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM])
								)
						)
						,
						IF(				
							HASONEVALUE('CALENDAR'[DAY OF WEEK NAME]),
										CALCULATE(
													[Revenue],
													FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
													'CALENDAR'[YEAR - CUSTOM]=(MAX('CALENDAR'[YEAR - CUSTOM])-1) &&
													'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]>=MIN('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]) &&
													'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]<=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]) &&
													'CALENDAR'[DAY OF WEEK NAME]=VALUES('CALENDAR'[DAY OF WEEK NAME])
													)
											)
											,	
										CALCULATE(
													[Revenue],
													FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
													'CALENDAR'[YEAR - CUSTOM]=(MAX('CALENDAR'[YEAR - CUSTOM])-1) &&
													'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]>=MIN('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]) &&
													'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]<=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM])
													)
											)
									)
							)

measures.name: Labor Cost - Hourly - Same Period - Last Year
Labor Cost - Hourly - Same Period - 364 Days Ago - CC
measures.expression:
CALCULATE([Labor Cost - Hourly],
                                          FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
                                          'CALENDAR'[DAY # - CUSTOM]>=MIN('CALENDAR'[DAY # - CUSTOM])-364 &&
                                          'CALENDAR'[DAY # - CUSTOM]<=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # - CUSTOM])-364
                                          )
)

measures.name: Labor Cost - Hourly - % Change - Same Period - 364 Days Ago - CC
measures.expression:
IF (
    ISBLANK ( [Labor Cost - Hourly] ),
    BLANK(),
    DIVIDE (
        	([Labor Cost - Hourly]
            	- [Labor Cost - Hourly - Same Period - 364 Days Ago - CC]),

    )
)

measures.name: Labor Cost - Hourly - % of Revenue - Change - Same Period - 364 Days Ago - CC
measures.expression:
IF (
    OR (
        ISBLANK ( 'LABOR - COST'[Labor Cost - Hourly - % of Revenue] ),
        ISBLANK ( [Labor Cost - Hourly - % of Revenue - Same Period - Last Year - 364 Days Ago - CC] )
    ),
  	BLANK(),
    	[Labor Cost - Hourly - % of Revenue]
        - [Labor Cost - Hourly - % of Revenue - Same Period - Last Year - 364 Days Ago - CC]
)

measures.name: Employee Count
measures.expression: DISTINCTCOUNT(TIME_CLOCK_DETAIL_FINAL[EMPLOYEE ID])

measures.name: Labor Count
measures.expression:
CALCULATE(
                                 
                                 COUNTA('TIME_CLOCK_DETAIL_FINAL'[LOCATION JOB KEY]),
                                 
                                 		FILTER('TIME_CLOCK_DETAIL_FINAL',
			                                              'TIME_CLOCK_DETAIL_FINAL'[CLOCK-IN]<=MAX('TIME OF DAY'[TIME OF DAY (USE)]) 
			                                              ),
			                                              
			                        FILTER('TIME_CLOCK_DETAIL_FINAL',
			                                              'TIME_CLOCK_DETAIL_FINAL'[CLOCK-OUT]>=MIN('TIME OF DAY'[TIME OF DAY (USE)])
			                                     		),
			                                     		
			                         FILTER('TIME_CLOCK_DETAIL_FINAL',
		                                                       'TIME_CLOCK_DETAIL_FINAL'[DAILY HOURS]>=1
		                                                       )	                                                        
			                                 
			             )

measures.expression: Hourly

measures.name: Labor Count - Salary
measures.expression: Salary

measures.name: Labor Count - Hourly - Server

CALCULATE(
                                                               SUMX('CALENDAR',[Employee Count - Hourly - Server]),
                                                               FILTER('TIME_CLOCK_DETAIL_FINAL',
			                                              'TIME_CLOCK_DETAIL_FINAL'[CLOCK-IN]<=MAX('TIME OF DAY'[TIME OF DAY (USE)]) &&
			                                              'TIME_CLOCK_DETAIL_FINAL'[CLOCK-OUT]>=MIN('TIME OF DAY'[TIME OF DAY (USE)])
			                                     		)
			                                 )

measures.name: Day - Min
Payments - Same Period - Last Year
Payments - Total - Same Period - Last Year
Balance - Same Period - Last Year
Payments - Same Period - Last Year - CC
measures.expression:
IF(

				ISFILTERED('CALENDAR'[DATE]),
				
						CALCULATE(
								[Payments],
								FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
								'CALENDAR'[YEAR - CUSTOM]=(MAX('CALENDAR'[YEAR - CUSTOM])-1) &&
								'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]>=MIN('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]) &&
								'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]<=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM])
								)
						)
						,
						IF(				
							HASONEVALUE('CALENDAR'[DAY OF WEEK NAME]),
										CALCULATE(
													[Payments],
													FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),

								'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]>=MIN('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]) &&
								'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]<=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM])
								)
						)
						,
						IF(				
							HASONEVALUE('CALENDAR'[DAY OF WEEK NAME]),
										CALCULATE(
													[Labor Hours Worked - Over Time],
													FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
													'CALENDAR'[YEAR - CUSTOM]=(MAX('CALENDAR'[YEAR - CUSTOM])-1) &&
													'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]>=MIN('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]) &&
													'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]<=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]) &&
													'CALENDAR'[DAY OF WEEK NAME]=VALUES('CALENDAR'[DAY OF WEEK NAME])
													)
											)
											,	
										CALCULATE(
													[Labor Hours Worked - Over Time],
													FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
													'CALENDAR'[YEAR - CUSTOM]=(MAX('CALENDAR'[YEAR - CUSTOM])-1) &&
													'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]>=MIN('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]) &&
													'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]<=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF YEAR - CUSTOM])
													)
											)
									)
							)

measures.name: Date - Pay Period to Date - Start - CC
Date - Week to Date - Start - Last Year - CC
measures.expression:
IF(

       ISFILTERED('CALENDAR'[DATE]),
       
                 CALCULATE([Date - Min],
                         FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
                         'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR])-1 &&
                         'CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]) &&
                         'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]<=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM])
                 )
	),

	VAR WeekNumofYearCurrent = 
		CALCULATE(MAX('CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]),
		                        FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
		                        	'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]) 
		                      )
		  )
		  
         VAR WeektoDate=
                 CALCULATE(MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]),
                  FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
                  'CALENDAR'[DAY # - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # - CUSTOM])
                                       )
                                       
                   )
                  
		                          
	RETURN

		IF(
	        	HASONEVALUE('CALENDAR'[DAY OF WEEK NAME]),
	                      	CALCULATE([Date - Min],
	                      		FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
	                      		'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR])-1 &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]= WeekNumofYearCurrent &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]<= WeektoDate &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]=VALUES('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM])
	                      )
	               )
	               ,        
				CALCULATE([Date - Min],
	                      		FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
	                      		'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR])-1 &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]= WeekNumofYearCurrent &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]<= WeektoDate
	    		)
	    	)
	)
)

measures.name: Date - Pay Period to Date -Start - Last Pay Period - CC
Date - Pay Period to Date -End - Last Pay Period - CC
Date - Month to Date - Start - CC
measures.expression:
IF(

       ISFILTERED('CALENDAR'[DATE]),
       
                  CALCULATE([Date - Min],
                            FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
                            'CALENDAR'[MONTH # - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[MONTH # - CUSTOM]) &&
                            'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF MNTH - CUSTOM]<=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF MNTH - CUSTOM])
                            )
                   ),

	VAR MonthToDateCurrent = 
		CALCULATE(MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF MNTH - CUSTOM]),
		                        FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
		                        	'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]) &&
		                        	'CALENDAR'[MONTH # - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[MONTH # - CUSTOM]) 
		                        
		                        )
		  )
		                          
	RETURN

		IF(
	        	HASONEVALUE('CALENDAR'[DAY OF WEEK NAME]),
	                      	CALCULATE([Date - Min],
	                      		FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
	                      		'CALENDAR'[MONTH # - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[MONTH # - CUSTOM]) &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF MNTH - CUSTOM]<= MonthToDateCurrent &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]=VALUES('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM])
	                      )
	               )
	               ,        
				CALCULATE([Date - Min],
	                      		FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
	                      		'CALENDAR'[MONTH # - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[MONTH # - CUSTOM])&&
	                     		 'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF MNTH - CUSTOM]<= MonthToDateCurrent

measures.name: Revenue - Month to Date - CC

       ISFILTERED('CALENDAR'[DATE]),
       
                  CALCULATE([Revenue],
                            FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
                            'CALENDAR'[MONTH # - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[MONTH # - CUSTOM]) &&
                            'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF MNTH - CUSTOM]<=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF MNTH - CUSTOM])
                            )
                   ),

	VAR MonthToDateCurrent = 
		CALCULATE(MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF MNTH - CUSTOM]),
		                        FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),

		                        	'CALENDAR'[MONTH # - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[MONTH # - CUSTOM]) 
		                        
		                        )
		  )
		                          
	RETURN

		IF(
	        	HASONEVALUE('CALENDAR'[DAY OF WEEK NAME]),
	                      	CALCULATE([Revenue],
	                      		FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
	                      		'CALENDAR'[MONTH # - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[MONTH # - CUSTOM]) &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF MNTH - CUSTOM]<= MonthToDateCurrent &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]=VALUES('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM])
	                      )
	               )
	               ,        
				CALCULATE([Revenue],
	                      		FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
	                      		'CALENDAR'[MONTH # - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[MONTH # - CUSTOM])&&

	)
)

measures.expression:
IF(

       ISFILTERED('CALENDAR'[DATE]),
       
                 CALCULATE([Revenue],
                         FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
                         'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR])-1 &&
                         'CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]) &&
                         'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]<=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM])
                 )
	),

	VAR WeekNumofYearCurrent = 
		CALCULATE(MAX('CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]),
		                        FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
		                        	'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]) 
		                      )
		  )
		  
         VAR WeektoDate=
                 CALCULATE(MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]),
                  FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
                  'CALENDAR'[DAY # - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # - CUSTOM])
                                       )
                                       
                   )
                  
		                          
	RETURN

		IF(
	        	HASONEVALUE('CALENDAR'[DAY OF WEEK NAME]),
	                      	CALCULATE([Revenue],
	                      		FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
	                      		'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR])-1 &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]= WeekNumofYearCurrent &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]<= WeektoDate &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]=VALUES('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM])
	                      )
	               )

measures.name: Payments - Yesterday
measures.expression:
CALCULATE (
 [Payments],
 FILTER (
 ALL ('CALENDAR'[DAY #] ),
 'CALENDAR'[DAY #]
 = MAX ('CALENDAR'[DAY #])
 )
)

measures.name: Payments - Total - Yesterday
Balance - Yesterday
Payments - Month to Date
measures.expression:
IF(

       ISFILTERED('CALENDAR'[DATE]),
       
                  CALCULATE([Payments],
                            FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
                            'CALENDAR'[MONTH #]=MAX('CALENDAR'[MONTH #]) &&
                            'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF MNTH]<=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF MNTH])
                            )
                   ),

	VAR MonthToDateCurrent = 
		CALCULATE(MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF MNTH]),
		                        FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
		                        	'CALENDAR'[YEAR #]=MAX('CALENDAR'[YEAR #]) &&
		                        	'CALENDAR'[MONTH #]=MAX('CALENDAR'[MONTH #]) 
		                        
		                        )
		  )
		                          
	RETURN

		IF(
	        	HASONEVALUE('CALENDAR'[DAY OF WEEK NAME]),
	                      	CALCULATE([Payments],
	                      		FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
	                      		'CALENDAR'[MONTH #]=MAX('CALENDAR'[MONTH #]) &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF MNTH]<= MonthToDateCurrent &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]=VALUES('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM])
	                      )
	               )
	               ,        
				CALCULATE([Payments],
	                      		FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
	                      		'CALENDAR'[MONTH #]=MAX('CALENDAR'[MONTH #])&&
	                     		 'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF MNTH]<= MonthToDateCurrent
	    		)
	    	)
	)
)

measures.name: Payments - Total - Month to Date
measures.expression:
IF(

       ISFILTERED('CALENDAR'[DATE]),
       
                  CALCULATE([Payments - Total],
                            FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
                            'CALENDAR'[MONTH #]=MAX('CALENDAR'[MONTH #]) &&

measures.expression:
IF(

       ISFILTERED('CALENDAR'[DATE]),
       
                 CALCULATE([Taxes],
                         FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
                         'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR])-1 &&
                         'CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]) &&
                         'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]<=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM])
                 )
	),

	VAR WeekNumofYearCurrent = 
		CALCULATE(MAX('CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]),
		                        FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
		                        	'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]) 
		                      )
		  )
		  
         VAR WeektoDate=
                 CALCULATE(MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]),
                  FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
                  'CALENDAR'[DAY # - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # - CUSTOM])
                                       )
                                       
                   )
                  
		                          
	RETURN

		IF(
	        	HASONEVALUE('CALENDAR'[DAY OF WEEK NAME]),
	                      	CALCULATE([Taxes],
	                      		FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
	                      		'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR])-1 &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]= WeekNumofYearCurrent &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]<= WeektoDate &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]=VALUES('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM])
	                      )
	               )
	               ,        
				CALCULATE([Taxes],
	                      		FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
	                      		'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR])-1 &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]= WeekNumofYearCurrent &&

	    		)
	    	)
	)
)

measures.name: Labor Count - Yesterday
Labor Count - Hourly - Yesterday
Labor Count - Week to Date - CC
measures.expression:
IF(

       ISFILTERED('CALENDAR'[DATE]),
       
                 CALCULATE([Labor Count],
                         FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
                         'CALENDAR'[WEEK #]=MAX('CALENDAR'[WEEK #]) &&
                         'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]<=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM])
                 )
	),

	VAR WeekNumofYearCurrent = 
		CALCULATE(MAX('CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]),
		                        FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
		                        	'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]) 
		                      )
		  )
		  
         VAR WeektoDate=
                 CALCULATE(MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]),
                  FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
                  'CALENDAR'[DAY # - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # - CUSTOM])
                                       )
                                       
                   )
                  
		                          
	RETURN

		IF(
	        	HASONEVALUE('CALENDAR'[DAY OF WEEK NAME]),
	                      	CALCULATE([Labor Count],
	                      		FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
	                      		'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]) &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]= WeekNumofYearCurrent &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]<= WeektoDate &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]=VALUES('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM])
	                      )
	               )
	               ,        
				CALCULATE([Labor Count],
	                      		FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
	                      		'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]) &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]= WeekNumofYearCurrent &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]<= WeektoDate
	    		)
	    	)
	)
)

measures.name: Labor Cost - Hourly - Week to Date - Last Year - CC
measures.expression:
IF(

       ISFILTERED('CALENDAR'[DATE]),
       
                 CALCULATE([Labor Cost - Hourly],
                         FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
                         'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR])-1 &&
                         'CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]) &&
                         'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]<=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM])
                 )
	),

	VAR WeekNumofYearCurrent = 
		CALCULATE(MAX('CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]),
		                        FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
		                        	'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]) 
		                      )
		  )
		  
         VAR WeektoDate=
                 CALCULATE(MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]),
                  FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
                  'CALENDAR'[DAY # - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[DAY # - CUSTOM])
                                       )
                                       
                   )
                  
		                          
	RETURN

		IF(
	        	HASONEVALUE('CALENDAR'[DAY OF WEEK NAME]),
	                      	CALCULATE([Labor Cost - Hourly],
	                      		FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
	                      		'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR])-1 &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]= WeekNumofYearCurrent &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]<= WeektoDate &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]=VALUES('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM])
	                      )
	               )
	               ,        
				CALCULATE([Labor Cost - Hourly],
	                      		FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
	                      		'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR])-1 &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[WEEK # OF YEAR - CUSTOM]= WeekNumofYearCurrent &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]<= WeektoDate
	    		)
	    	)
	)
)

		                        	'CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]=MAX('CALENDAR'[CUSTOM - # YEAR]) &&
		                        	'CALENDAR'[QTR # - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[QTR # - CUSTOM]) 
		                        
		                        )
		  )
		                          
	RETURN

		IF(
	        	HASONEVALUE('CALENDAR'[DAY OF WEEK NAME]),
	                      	CALCULATE([Gratuities],
	                      		FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
	                      		'CALENDAR'[QTR # - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[QTR # - CUSTOM])-4 &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # of QTR - CUSTOM]<= QuarterToDateCurrent &&
	                      		'CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM]=VALUES('CALENDAR'[DAY # OF WEEK - CUSTOM])
	                      )
	               )
	               ,        
				CALCULATE([Gratuities],
	                      		FILTER(ALL('CALENDAR'),
	                      		'CALENDAR'[QTR # - CUSTOM]=MAX('CALENDAR'[QTR # - CUSTOM])-4 &&
	                     		 'CALENDAR'[DAY # of QTR - CUSTOM]<= QuarterToDateCurrent
	    		)
	    	)
	)
)
